thread.title: Dexa improves consumer wellbeing in Ibadan
thread.title_full: Dexa improves consumer wellbeing in Ibadan

author: Nwafor Polycarp
title: Dexa improves consumer wellbeing in Ibadan

organizations.name: nwafor polycarp comments  major pain killer company

text:
Home » Health » Dexa improves consumer wellbeing in Ibadan Dexa improves consumer wellbeing in Ibadan On 3:14 am In Health by Nwafor Polycarp Comments 
Major Pain killer Company, Dexa Medica makers of Boska yesterday conducted another wave of its Pain Free Day initiative at Sasha market in Ibadan area of Oyo State with a view to help consumers stay fit at all time. 
The Pain Free Day initiative aimed at improving consumers’ health and raising awareness of the risks associated with inadequate care of oneself was informed by findings which showed that most consumers are ignorance of how to take care of themselves. It was also tragetted at making them know that the brand is available to help them stay fit during this harsh economic period. 
Boska team provided the opportunity for participants to receive free consultation by health experts. The high point of the event was free distribution of eye glasses for those in need as well as drugs to treat eye, ear and nose disorders. 
Brand Executive Dexa Medica, Kafayat Moradeyo,, said the edition is specially designed to keep consumers fit as they go about their domestic and work activities. “I am confident that Dexa Medica will continue to improve the delivery of quality health care for consumers in the months ahead. 
Besides rendering free health services, Boska team also leveraged the opportunity to educate consumers on how to live stress-free while at their various duties. Nwafor Polycarp
